mapper.select: SELECT OD.ORDER_ID, OD.SALES_POST_ID, OD.UNIT_PRICE, OD.DISCOUNT_PRICE, OD.QUANTITY AS ORDER_QUANTITY, SP.TITLE AS SALES_POST_TITLE, SP.DESCRIPTION AS SALES_POST_DESCRIPTION, SP.ID AS SALES_POST_ID, SPF.FILE_PATH, SPF.FILE_TYPE FROM ORDER_STATUS_TB OS JOIN ORDER_DETAIL_TB OD ON OS.ORDER_ID = OD.ORDER_ID JOIN SALES_POST_TB SP ON OD.SALES_POST_ID = SP.ID JOIN SALES_POST_FILE_TB SPF ON SP.ID = SPF.SALES_POST_ID WHERE OS.ORDER_STATUS = '배송완료' ORDER BY OD.QUANTITY DESC
